name: Detective Yams & Tucker
description:
Detective Yams & Tucker have received a call from a new client: Ms. Cheddar. After losing her most precious treasure, she turns to this trusty duo to get it back. With Tucker's guidance, Yams sets out to investigate the hideout of Bubu's gang, the prime suspect!

------------

El Detective Yams y Tucker han recibido una llamada de una nueva cliente: la Sra. Cheddar.  Al perder su más preciado tesoro, pide la ayuda de este dúo confiable para recuperarlo. Con la guía de Tucker, Yams se dirige a investigar el escondite de la pandilla de Bubu, ¡el sospechoso principal! 

------------
Instructions can be found in game. Developed for the Global Game Jam 2021.

Art:
Carlos Uriel García Leonardo (Does) - Pixel Artist
Débora Preciado (DebyApplefield) - 2D Artist

Music & Audio:
Jorge Iglesias (George Guilty) 

Narrative:
Gretel Torrijos (Gretzilla)

Programming:
Helena Ruiz (rena621)
Juan Gallardo (JoseJuan)
Rodolfo León Gasca (RegularEarth)
Yusdivia Molina (Yus)
